title: Rajasthan Heritage Tour - Jaipur
description: Explore the Pink City's magnificent palaces, forts, and cultural heritage. Visit Amer Fort, City Palace, Hawa Mahal, and Jantar Mantar observatory.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival, City Palace, Jantar Mantar, Hawa Mahal
Day 2: Amer Fort, Jal Mahal, Albert Hall Museum
Day 3: Local markets, Cultural show, Departure

title: Uttarakhand Nature & Adventure Camp
description: Experience the beauty of the Himalayas with trekking, wildlife spotting, and environmental education in Uttarakhand's pristine nature.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival, Nature walk, Orientation
Day 2: Trekking, Wildlife observation
Day 3: River rafting, Environmental workshop
Day 4: Local village visit, Departure

title: Kerala Backwaters & Culture
description: Discover Kerala's unique backwaters, traditional art forms, and rich cultural heritage through houseboat rides and cultural performances.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival, Spice plantation tour, Local village visit
Day 2: Houseboat cruise, Kathakali performance
Day 3: Ayurveda workshop, Traditional crafts, Departure

title: Delhi Historical & Modern Tour
description: Explore India's capital with visits to Red Fort, Qutub Minar, India Gate, and modern attractions like Lotus Temple and Akshardham.
itinerary: Day 1: Red Fort, Jama Masjid, Raj Ghat, India Gate
Day 2: Qutub Minar, Lotus Temple, Akshardham Temple

title: Tamil Nadu Temples & Culture
description: Discover the architectural marvels of Tamil Nadu including Brihadeshwara Temple, Meenakshi Temple, and traditional South Indian culture.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival, Brihadeshwara Temple, Tanjore Palace
Day 2: Meenakshi Temple, Madurai city tour
Day 3: Traditional dance workshop, Local crafts, Departure

title: Gujarat Heritage & Wildlife
description: Explore Gujarat's rich heritage including Rann of Kutch, Gir National Park, and ancient stepwells while learning about wildlife conservation.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival, Gir National Park safari
Day 2: Rann of Kutch, Salt desert exploration
Day 3: Ancient stepwells, Cultural villages
Day 4: Wildlife conservation workshop, Departure

title: Himachal Pradesh Adventure & Nature
description: Experience the beauty of Himachal Pradesh with trekking, river activities, and environmental education in the lap of the Himalayas.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival, Acclimatization, Local village visit
Day 2: Trekking expedition, Nature photography
Day 3: River activities, Environmental workshop
Day 4: Mountain biking, Local culture immersion
Day 5: Conservation activities, Departure

title: Karnataka Science & Technology
description: Explore India's Silicon Valley with visits to science museums, tech parks, and educational institutions showcasing India's technological advancement.
itinerary: Day 1: Visvesvaraya Industrial Museum, ISRO center
Day 2: Tech park visits, Innovation workshop, Science lab

title: Maharashtra Forts & Caves
description: Discover Maharashtra's rich history through visits to ancient forts, Ajanta-Ellora caves, and historical monuments showcasing Maratha heritage.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival, Ajanta Caves exploration
Day 2: Ellora Caves, Aurangabad city tour
Day 3: Raigad Fort, Shivaji Maharaj Museum, Departure

title: West Bengal Culture & Literature
description: Immerse in Bengal's rich cultural heritage, literature, and arts through visits to museums, cultural centers, and traditional workshops.
itinerary: Day 1: Arrival, Victoria Memorial, Indian Museum
Day 2: Tagore House, Literature workshop
Day 3: Traditional arts workshop, Local culture, Departure
